attributes.action: MPs to take year 6 SATS tests, then reassess grammar (and all) expectations.
attributes.background: We believe the level of grammar expected is far beyond necessary and causing unnecessary stress on both children and teachers. (Many of whom were educated under the previous conservative government who removed grammar from the curriculum!) We would like MPs to take the tests to see for themselves.

rejection.details:
If you would like these tests to be abolished, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/122428
